description:
At Lesser, Lesser, Landy & Smith, PLLC, we have provided personal injury representation to people in Stuart for 90 years. Our Florida lawyers bring a combined 300 years of experience to the table and have handled more than 2,000 cases. During this time, our law firm has won millions of dollars on behalf of our clients and would love to win millions for you.

Our personal injury cases

Car crashes and wrongful death cases make up a big portion of the cases we handle on behalf of our clients. Here are some additional personal injury cases handled by our law firm:

• Medical malpractice
• Sexual abuse
• Aviation and mass transit accidents
• Class action lawsuits
• Animal bites
• Assault and battery (plaintiffs)

Why choose Lesser, Lesser, Landy & Smith, PLLC

When you go up against large corporations and insurance companies, they have a large team of professionals to tap into. Do you have a law firm to defend you that levels the playing field? We have a large team of professionals who love winning.
We also never represent insurance companies or other corporations, so you can rest easy knowing your opponents are unlikely to be former clients of ours. This significantly reduces the risk of conflicts of interest. To further reduce risks in your case, the initial consultation is free.
